title: Sony Japan Global Hiring 2025
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Greetings from the Global Talent Acquisition Team at Sony HQ in Tokyo!
 We are excited to announce that we start recruitment process for STEM undergraduate and graduate (Master’s and PhD) students who can join in 2025.
A variety of job positions (internship and full time) are available!
 Please see the details through Sony Global Careers Website and apply to the position!
 [Details of the position and how to apply]
Step 1: Please go to the Sony Global Careers Website
     https://sonyglobal.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/SonyJapanCareers
Step 2: Browse all open positions and select the one that best suits your background/expertise.
Step 3: Click `Apply` to create an account and submit an application.
 [Working Location] Tokyo, Japan
[Language] Japanese language skill is NOT necessary to apply to the position
[First Application Deadline] September 1st, 2024
[For more details] Please see the attached flyer and our website HERE
 We are looking forward to your application!
 Sincerely,
Global Talent Acquisition Team, Sony Group Corporation
